item.title: Doctor accused of sexually abusing a toddler
item.description: A Wisconsin doctor is accused of sexually abusing a toddler and recording videos of the abuse.

item.title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy again but vows to keep flying
item.description: Budget carrier Spirit Airlines said Friday that it has filed for fresh bankruptcy protection.

item.title: Carabiners recalled because locking mechanism can break, posing risk of injury or death
item.description: Batches of carabiners used for climbing and rappelling have been recalled due to a risk of injury or death.

item.title: BBB alerts consumers to rising text scams
item.description: Phony text messages are on the rise – from fake job offers to bogus toll alerts. Consumer Investigator Caresse Jackman talks to the BBB about the latest text scams and how to spot them before it’s too late.

item.description: Dismantling the facility could cost the state between $15 million and $20 million.

item.title: A quiet Saturday, more thunderstorms Sunday and Monday
